# Level 2: RECON

This report provides a targeted view for the RECON Team. 

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Filter for the engineered channel component
L2_risk <- filter(risk, eng_level == 2)
```

## Risks
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
risk_register_table(L2_risk)
```

## Summary
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=7, fig.height=9, out.width='100%', fig.cap = paste0("Risk Characteristics (n = ", length(unique(L2_risk$RISK_NO)), ")")}
p1 <- percent_treemap(L2_risk, RISKCATEGORY, "Risk Categories")
p2 <- percent_treemap(L2_risk, COMPONENT, "Project Components")
p3 <- percent_treemap(L2_risk, RISK_STRATEGY, "Risk Strategy")
p4 <- percent_treemap(L2_risk, TIMING_OF_DELAY, "Timing of Delay")
p5 <- percent_treemap(L2_risk, DISCIPLINE, "Discpline")
grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, nrow = 3, ncol = 2)
```
